Body.Content:
Starting June 18, 2024, a new feature, set up fallback UI automation mechanism, will be made generally available for all users.

This feature provides a reliable solution for UI and browser automation actions. With this feature, users can set up a fallback mechanism for UI automation actions in case the UI element cannot be found through the set selector(s).

How does this affect me?
Users can improve their automation processes and reduce the risk of errors and delays caused by missing UI elements.

Users can enable this feature on an action level.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Automate - Set up fallback UI automation mechanism now available in Power Automate for Desktop
